verses.text:
Look up to the glo-ri-ous sun, Hear the king's de-cree,
See the form-ing giv-en ban-ners, And the faith-ful three;
'Tows the ban-ner of our coun-try, Free now and for-est brave,
And what-e'er be-tide the brave ones, Far-thers, free and bold.

chorus.text:
Stand by the word, come good or ill,
Truth is the Lord, O let us trust in the Lord.
